# Khaled Garbaya

> Engineering Leader, Developer, and Educator. Personal website with technical blog posts and TIL entries about web development, AI, and software engineering.

## Documentation

- [Blog](/blog): Technical blog posts about web development, AI, leadership, and software engineering
- [TIL](/til): Today I Learned entries - short-form technical learnings
- [About](/about): Background, journey, and professional experience
- [Uses](/uses): Tools, software, and hardware setup

## Feeds

- [Blog RSS](/rss.xml): Subscribe to blog posts
- [TIL RSS](/til-rss.xml): Subscribe to TIL entries
- [Sitemap](/sitemap-index.xml): Full site structure
- [AI Info](/ai.txt): AI crawling and usage information

## Author

Khaled Garbaya is an Engineering Leader and Developer based in Munich, Germany. He writes about web development, software engineering, AI, and leadership topics.

## Contact

- Website: https://khaledgarbaya.net
- Twitter: @khaled_garbaya
- GitHub: @kgarbaya
